title: Lemonoid
description: A bullet hell Scratch game where players control a spaceship to blast meteorites in the shape of lemons.

title: Pong
description: A recreation of the classic Pong game implemented in Scratch, where one or two players control paddles to bounce a ball back and forth and score points by getting the ball past the opponent's paddle.

title: Rock Paper Scissors
description: The classic Rock Paper Scissors game implemented in Scratch, using sprite costumes for choices and random number blocks to simulate the computer's move.

title: My Platformer
description: A generic Scratch platformer where players control a purple character to explore levels, jump across platforms, and collect items for points.
